CMiragia.cpp

00001 /*
00002  * CMiragia.cpp
00003  *
00004  *  Created on: 31.07.2010
00005  *      Author: gerstrong
00006  */
00007 
00008 #include "CMiragia.h"
00009 
00010 namespace galaxy {
00011 
00012 const Uint16 ANIMATION_TIME = 32;
00013 const Uint16 WAIT_BETWEEN_FADE_TIME = 8;
00014 
00015 CMiragia::CMiragia(CMap *pmap, const VectorD2<Uint32> &Location) :
00016 CObject(pmap, Location.x, Location.y, OBJ_NONE),
00017 m_step(0),
00018 m_fade(FADE_IN),
00019 m_waittime(WAIT_BETWEEN_FADE_TIME)
00020 {}
00021 
00022 /**
00023  * main process cycle in which the tiles are interchanged.
00024  */
00025 void CMiragia::process()
00026 {
00027  // Similar to the flag we use the animation timer and time to make it happen!
00028  if(mp_Map->getAnimtiletimer()%ANIMATION_TIME == 0)
00029  {
00030   if(m_waittime == 0)
00031   {
00032    // Now replace those tiles
00033    for(size_t x=0 ; x<6 ; x++)
00034    {
00035     for(size_t y=0 ; y<4 ; y++)
00036     {
00037      const Uint16 l_x = ((x+2+m_step*6)<<CSF);
00038      const Uint16 l_y = ((mp_Map->m_height+y-6)<<CSF);
00039      const Uint16 where_x = (getXPosition()>>CSF)+x;
00040      const Uint16 where_y = (getYPosition()>>CSF)+y;
00041      const Uint16 tile = mp_Map->getPlaneDataAt( 1, l_x, l_y );
00042      mp_Map->setTile(where_x, where_y, tile, true, 1);
00043      const Uint16 object = mp_Map->getPlaneDataAt( 2, l_x, l_y );
00044      mp_Map->setTile(where_x, where_y, object, false, 2);
00045     }
00046    }
00047 
00048    if(m_step >= 4)
00049    {
00050     m_waittime = WAIT_BETWEEN_FADE_TIME;
00051     m_fade = FADE_OUT;
00052    }
00053    if(m_step == 0)
00054    {
00055     m_waittime = WAIT_BETWEEN_FADE_TIME;
00056     m_fade = FADE_IN;
00057    }
00058 
00059    if(m_fade == FADE_IN)
00060     m_step++;
00061    else
00062     m_step--;
00063   }
00064   else
00065    m_waittime--;
00066  }
00067 }
00068 
00069 }
